name: Heritage Village,Abu dhabi - UAE
description: This is a great family friendly attraction with lots of fun things to do with the kids! There are Bedouin tents set up with campfires brewing up the famous Arabic tea. Your children will love the camels, Arabian horses and goats on display. There are several artisan exhibits showcasing the local arts such as weaving or glass blowing. There are often falconry demonstrations as well.
